name: .VCXPROJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .VCXPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: VCXPROJ files are meant to be opened and edited in Microsoft Visual Studio (Windows, Mac) as part of Visual Studio projects. However, because VCXPROJ files are XML files, you can open and edit them in any text or source code editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
